feed.title: Tough questions for Peter Todd, Chief Scientist {Mastercoin | Counterparty | Coinkite | Darkwallet | Viacoin}

entry.title: Tough questions for Peter Todd, Chief Scientist {Mastercoin | Counterparty | Coinkite | Darkwallet | Viacoin}
entry.summary: The email conversation shown here is off-topic and inappropriate for the Bitcoin-development mailing list. One person asks a series of questions related to a project, but another member responds, asking why it matters to anyone on the list. The meta-level observation is that all anti-Todd comments are coming from *@airmail.cc accounts. It's unclear what this means or why it's relevant. There is no summary provided in the text.
